2026 Compensation

Finance Salary Guide 2026

Investment banking, private equity, and hedge fund compensation for 2026. Base salaries, bonuses, and total comp by level.

Career GuideView Salaries

$110K

IB Analyst 1 Base

$250K+

IB Analyst 1 Total

$400K+

PE Associate 1 Total

$500K+

HF Analyst Total

Investment Banking 2026

Bulge bracket and elite boutique compensation. All figures in USD.

LevelBaseBonusTotal CompHours/Wk
Analyst 1$110,000$90,000-$140,000$200,000-$250,00080-100
Analyst 2$125,000$100,000-$170,000$225,000-$295,00075-95
Analyst 3$140,000$120,000-$200,000$260,000-$340,00070-90
Associate 1$175,000$100,000-$200,000$275,000-$375,00070-85
Associate 2$200,000$150,000-$275,000$350,000-$475,00065-80
Associate 3$225,000$175,000-$325,000$400,000-$550,00060-75
VP$275,000$200,000-$500,000$475,000-$775,00055-70

Private Equity 2026

Megafund and upper middle market PE compensation. Carry adds significant long-term value.

LevelBaseBonusCarryTotal (excl. carry)
Associate 1$175,000$125,000-$225,000Yes$300,000-$400,000+
Associate 2$200,000$175,000-$300,000Yes$375,000-$500,000+
Senior Associate$250,000$200,000-$400,000Yes$450,000-$650,000+
VP$325,000$250,000-$600,000Yes$575,000-$925,000+
Principal$400,000$400,000-$1,000,000Significant$800,000-$1,400,000+

Note on Carry: Carried interest can add significant value over time (often $1M+ over a fund's life at senior levels), but it's illiquid and depends on fund performance.

Hedge Funds 2026

Hedge fund comp is highly variable. Top performers at top funds earn multiples of these figures.

LevelBaseBonusP&L LinkTotal Range
Analyst$150,000-$200,00050-150% of baseYes for some$225,000-$500,000+
Senior Analyst$200,000-$300,000100-300% of baseYes$400,000-$1,200,000+
PM$300,000-$500,000Based on P&LSignificant$500,000-$5,000,000+

Key point: HF comp is bimodal. Median analyst might make $300K while top performers at the same fund make $1M+. Performance is everything.

What's Changed for 2026

Base Increases

Analyst 1 base now $110K at most BBs (up from $100K). Elite boutiques at $115K+.

Bonus Normalization

After 2021-2022 highs, bonuses settling into new normal. Still above pre-COVID.

Stub Bonuses

Starting bonuses (stubs) for summer analysts converting to FT remain competitive.

PE Premium

PE compensation continues to outpace banking at associate level, especially with carry.

HF Variance

Hedge fund comp most variable. Top performers make multiples of banking peers.

Land the Offer First

Compensation doesn't matter if you don't get the job. Prepare properly.
